messages.subject: Re: An article on our house concerts
messages.msgSnippet: One more reason why you are totally my hero!!   If Liz sees this she s going to want to move there.   Just add it to the list of places she wants to go  : )
messages.messageBody:
One more reason why you are totally my hero!! If Liz sees this she's
going to want to move there. Just add it to the list of places she
wants to go : )
Kelly

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] An article on our house concerts
messages.msgSnippet: Thank you so much Kelly! You have no idea what this set in motion! We have this old swimming pool we want to convert into something else, and so far we thought
messages.messageBody:
Thank you so much Kelly! You have no idea what this set in motion! We have this old swimming pool we want to convert into something else, and so far we thought about a greenhouse/studio combination. But it turns out that a stage would be such a great thing. The kids would love doing theater shows and forming their own group, I have been wanting to do a dance group etc. So now we are actively thinking on how to make the old swimming pool into a performance space, surrounded by flowers and doubling as a hang-out with firepit... Thank you, thank you!
Mara


----- Original Message ----
From: "kbcdlovejo@..." <kbcdlovejo@...>
To: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com; schoolsoutsupport@yahoogroups.com; AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Sunday, July 27, 2008 10:06:41 AM
Subject: [unschoolingbasics] An article on our house concerts


One of our new interests is hosting house concerts. On our new bitchin'
deck (built by Ren's husband, Bleu), we host a singer-songwriter once a
month. We call our series (and the deck) The Opulent 'Possum---kind of
"down-home elegant." <G>
The State newspaper did an article on alternative music venues in town
and featured The 'Possum.

http://www.thestate .com/sunday- life/story/ 472271.html

~Kelly

Kelly Lovejoy
Conference Coordinator
Live and Learn Unschooling Conference
http://www.LiveandL earnConference. org
